name: partake
content:
partake verb [I]
(EAT/DRINK)
Add to word list
Add to word list
old-fashioned or humorous to eat or drink: Would you care to partake of a little wine with us?

Drinking
partake verb [I]
(TAKE PART)
old-fashioned or formal to become involved with or take part in something: She was happy to partake in the festivities.

Add to word list
Add to word list
to become involved with or take part in something with other people
To partake of food or drink is to eat or drink some of it: Feel free to partake of the food and drink displayed on tables.
